name: NRS Hydroskin 0.5mm Shorts - Men's
description:
Just keep swimming or surfing....or whatever your jam is. These stretchy shorts add a little bit of insulation so you can stay in the water a little longer.Terreprene is non-allergenic and neoprene-free, made of limestone and recycled rubber tires.4-way stretch Terreprene is 0.5mm thick on the thighs with spandex in the crotch.Body-mapped design allows comfortable range of motion.Titanium layer reflects heat back to your body so you stay warmer.ThermalPlush lining is warm and comfortable next to skin.

        Sustainability





.st0{stroke:#333;stroke-width:.79;stroke-miterlimit:10}








                      Recycled content
